concept.title: HTTP Client
concept.shortdesc: The HTTP Client origin reads JSON data from an HTTP resource URL.

conbody.p: HTTP Client originovervieworiginsHTTP ClientWhen you configure HTTP Client, you specify the resource URL and other read properties. When required, you can provide OAuth credentials or use runtime resources to save OAuth credentials in restricted files for runtime-only access.Adam - worth mentioning runtime resources here? Or remove? Thought I might highlight it in a few places since it's an invisible feature.
